section.title: Terminology and notation
section.p:
The following definitions all apply to an m \times n matrix.
column space
the subspace of \R^m formed by the span the columns of the matrix
row space
the subspace of R^n formed by the span the rows of the matrix
null space
the subspace of R^n formed by the solution set of the homogeneous system with that matrix as the coefficient matrix
nullity
the dimension of the null space of the matrix
